Constructor Detail

JsonParser.Escape

public JsonParser.Escape(int code,
                         String detail)
Create an exception with a code and details. It is recommened that the detail always include very specific information about the cause of the error.

Parameters:
code - The error code.
detail - Specific detail text indicating the cause of the error.

JsonParser.Escape

public JsonParser.Escape(int code,
                         String detail,
                         Throwable cause)
Create an exception with a code and details. It is recommened that the detail always include very specific information about the cause of the error.

Parameters:
code - The error code.
detail - Specific detail text indicating the cause of the error.
cause - The causitive throwable object, if any.

Return the numeric code for this exception condition.
